generated_body: The article titled "House to hear from US official who said he overheard Trump, Sondland call" is likely to focus on a congressional hearing featuring a U.S. official who claims to have overheard a conversation between former President Donald Trump and Gordon Sondland, the former U.S. ambassador to the European Union. Readers can expect details about the context of this conversation, its implications for ongoing investigations, and how it relates to the broader political landscape. The article may also explore the potential impact of this testimony on public opinion and legislative actions regarding the Trump administration.
